‚ÄúDurations define the amount of intervening time in a time interval and are represented by the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S or P[n]W‚Ä¶‚Äù
[ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601 ]
